html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Use elementary row operations to put matrices into row-reduced echelon form (RREF).
Interpret RREF matrices to determine existence and uniqueness of solutions.
Describe the set of all solutions to a consistent system of linear equations.

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 4 videos totaling 19 minutes, plus some questions.
